ai-tha-ap517:1.1_0: “A Buddha praised the appearance of a golden palanquin,
ai-tha-ap517:1.4_0: I worshiped an offering of flowers—
ai-tha-ap517:2.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap517:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap517:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap517:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nāgas.
ai-tha-ap517:7.1_0: The fifth Elder Nāgas was the fifth Great Dragons.
